title: Agbe
author: Agbe
content: Dem go return di money 2 di owners wey no dey aware at di moment b4 leaving?Paxful wey be Cryptocurrencies trading house e don make announcement sae dem won stop Operation in our kwantri nd dem get 1.5 millions Nigerian inside there. Nd dis piple many of dem e get money in dat house, so how dem go do with those plenty money wey inside? I dey tank God sae dem announced am b4 dem dey leave, so those wey dey active at di time of di announcement go login nd transfer their money 2 another wallet but wat di piple dat wey e no dey online, how dem go do am?Bitcoin platform with 1.5m Nigerian users shuts downI wanted make comment with it but I didn't see any thread on it here in the local board. If there is any tell me

comments.author: CryptopreneurBrainboss
comments.body: Paxful na a very rubbish exchange, scams accusations dun plenty for that platform right from time and e still dey surprised me say people still dey use the exchange. My very first experience with them is awful and with all the scam accusations i dey see online about them I no surprise to see this news wey you dey announced so. Sadly I no think say e get anything wey the authorities fit do for this matter unless e get people wey go carry the exchange to court and them go compensate people at the end still fit no reach the money wey you get for the exchange.This kind news na one reason dem advise us not to leave our money for exchanges, e no matter which side the exchange dey whether na decentralized or centralized e no matter, no trust anyone of them say you wan use them as bank or wallet for storing of your coins if not na you go still surfer am. Majority of the service providers for this industry no dey registered and we know say regulations no dey this side which means anything can happen and the government go turn eye commot. For this side na you dey incharge so dey do things you know go benefit you like having total control over your coins.

comments.author: Pokapoka124
comments.body: Paxful nor even follow for exchange for my side. Brainboss xchange sure pass am. That year wey I enter forum nai I read scam allegations against Paxful, some men here sef cap say the owner dey take coco and things nai make e head dey touch. Since that time I comot body for anything way be Paxful same with Luno, I nor de use yeye exchange if nor be Binance, Roqqu, remitano, or Patricia my hand nor dey.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Actually when I read this news yesterday, I just feel say na big scam even though,I never hear of paxful before. The owner say e won create a new coin,wey the name na noones,so that make people wey get investment for paxful go switch account over to e new decentralize peer to peer app..blablabla. I just dey fed up of the story because I know say na wash he dey wash people.I pity for those people wey get funds for that exchange,and e fit be say no way for them to fit collect back their funds. Everyday,we dey hear of different exchanges wey dey crash these days and we need to wise up so that make we no fall victim for them to achieve our hard earned funds.

comments.author: Dr.Bitcoin_Strange
comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on April 06, 2023, 07:14:29 PMPaxful na a very rubbish exchange, scams accusations dun plenty for that platform right from time and e still dey surprised me say people still dey use the exchange. exactly, but it seemed some people were still dependent on it because they had not had any bad experiences with them yet. You know, one will never complain about or hate a platform until they have had a taste of its unreliable service. I did a search about them, and I saw scam accusations against them in 2019. Now that they have closed their business, a few people have started threads asking if there is any platform that can replace Paxful. I have not used this platform, but some who introduced me to Bitcoin made mention of Paxful and asked me never to use the platform in purchasing crypto, although he did not mention if he had any bad experiences with them, but from the way he sounded, it seems they have shown him the pepper lesson before.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: I must say that this news came to me as a rude shock, I was still in the defence of Paxful a while ago when Localbitcoins exited as though they understood the business better. Not knowing that their days are also coming to an end soon. Personally, I've never been a fan since they have an unfavourable high fee, but this is sad for those that are making their livelihood from this scheme. Particularly those that are already rigid and trusted there, they will be looking elsewhere like the P2P of exchanges.The exchanges are now where many will run to as they are stable and don't do the P2P only.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: It's kind of funny that an exchange such as "Paxful" will want to disassociate itself from Nigeria without a single reason,  a country known to have the biggest market for tech & crypto in the entire African region, of which most companies planning to create a base.So on regards to this news, I was able to make some research on Google about how much do Nigerians worth on Paxful exchange, and I got to notice that the over 1.5 million Nigerians are worth over $1.5 billion, too big for an exchange to want to just let go for no just reason.

comments.author: BIT-BENDER
comments.body: Exchanges Dey my guys, for real I never hear about this exchange paxful but I go feel say na centralized exchange, and as them get 1.5 million user as the OP don talk e mean say people they use them.There exit plan no surprised me, e no easy for exchange to keep running especially for Nigeria way get some reservations for crypto-currency. For me I avoid to use such exchange because of situations like this, but if you are one that doesn’t leave your funds on an exchange then you no go too think am.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: For people wey no dey online go received mail from them because e no too go well say them go shut down without people's notice. Just as you talk self me happy too say dem make a formal announcement to the general public say them wan shut down and like this dem give date of closure so any body wey no fit meet up go entirely lose their money inside by then you no fit hold them say na them no allow you moved you funds.
